short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: a fun game where you make money

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple yet fun game where you press the button in the middle to make money (figurative money, not real money). It is the sequel to the game "Make Money", with more and improved features. I hope you have fun playing this game.
